Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, Swagger becomes the target of a nationwide manhunt. His daughter fights off a boy who was bullying her at school and this sets in motion a round of events that end in his direct confrontation with the local Meth drug lord. His past history with the biker gang also enters the arena, making matters more complex.
